amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit funds to be used to modify a military installation in the United States, including construction or modification of a facility on a military installation, to provide temporary housing for unaccompanied alien children.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds to be used to modify a military installation in the United States, including construction or modification of a facility on a military installation, to provide temporary housing for unaccompanied alien children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 315).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A023) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 315).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Byrne.
